text: Amir Houshang Saadati (, born September 23, 1981) is an Iranian football defender who currently plays for Damash Gilan F.C. in the Azadegan League. ==Club career== Saadati previously played for DSV Leoben in the Austrian First Division. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !Season!!Team!!Country!!Division!!Apps!!Goals |- |06/07||align="left"|Saipa||align="left"|||1||14||0 |- |07/08||align="left"|Damash||align="left"|||2||?||? |- |08/09||align="left"|Sepahan||align="left"|||1||8||0 |- |09/10||align="left"|Sepahan||align="left"|||1||0||0 |- |10/11||align="left"|Damash Gilan||align="left"|||2||2||0 |- |} ==References== Category:Iranian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Saipa F.C. players Category:Iranian expatriate footballers Category:People from Tehran Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Sepahan players Category:DSV Leoben players Category:Damash Gilan players Category:Damash Iranian players
title: Amir Saadati
